OOC: Cyberwolf, Starscream isnt power hungry anymore, ever since he became 
secretly in love with KitKat.  He and Drillbit are leaving the Predacons.

:::Starscream:::

Starscream: Very well then.  But you havent seen the last of me, let me tell 
you that.
::He hears Drillbit's words and smiles::
Starscream: Good.  Megatron will die sometime, if its by my hand or not, we 
shall have to see.  Now who killed Kitkat?

--part1_6c.55c61cf.2757b213_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<BR>Starscream: Good.  Megatron will die sometime, if its by my hand or not, we <BR>shall have to see.  Now who killed Kitkat?</FONT></HTML>
